WorkItem.ClosedComment: Rawr 2 isn't up to scale properly, we will not be fixing this as Rawr 3 makes it a moot point.
WorkItem.Description:
Title: "Welcome to Rawr" window display issue in Win7 w/ text scaling
 
Description: "Welcome to Rawr" window format has misplaced/disoriented text & graphics when text/items size set to medium in Windows 7
 
Steps to Reproduce:
 
   1. in Windows 7, right click blank space on desktop
   2. "Screen Resolution" -> "Make text and other items larger or smaller" -> "Medium"
   3. Log out of OS and back in
   4. Launch Rawr
 
Additional Information:
 
    * Rawr v2.2.27
    * Windows 7 RTM
    * Screenshot attached of Rawr at launch with medium settings
    * Side note:  It would be interesting to see if the same scaling issues arise in previous OSes with the accessibility settings adjusted for large fonts, etc.
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Welcome to Rawr Window Display issue in Win7 w/ Text Scaling
